entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
